title: Create React Email Link Component
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create an Email Link component in React that generates a link formatted to send an email. This component will use the mailto: link format and will accept props for the email recipient, email subject, and email body. We will also learn how to safely encode the email subject and body using encodeURIComponent.

meta.title: Create Email Link Component | React Tutorial
meta.description: Learn how to create a reusable Email Link component in React that generates a mailto link with customizable subject and body content.
meta.keywords: React, Email Link, mailto, encodeURIComponent, component, tutorial
